pc.text:
Makes a new deck
B = Blue
M = Magenta
G = Green

0-15 Numbers
# = Any Number Card x 3 per color

D3 = Draw 3 x 3
WD6 = Wild Draw 6 x 2
W3 = WIld 3

S = Skip

pt.text: This should only be run once, distributes the inital # of cards to each player

STRING1: : Card Hidden due to redraw or end of turn -

COMMENT: Once the addition requirements are met, this will be 1
Move all of the cards into the Discard Pile, then make the active card the first card placed on the addition spot
Display what the cards will add up to
Turn ended, clear the list
replace all cards with 0, 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7 in S1's deck
all of the addition script
redraw all of the cards, for debugging purposes
Pre-define runtime options
spin when on the addition spot

z@.text: Only true if can't be played or is a Draw card

z[.text: Only true if can't be played or is a Draw card

COMMENT: Displays who's turn it is
Waits for space or the text to be pressed in order to show the player's cards
Show "Bitte Warten" on screen
despite this only showing for 0.3 seconds, its to give the player something
0.3 seconds is a bit long, 0.1 seconds works consistently on good computers, the chromebook is very inconsistent, so 0.3 is just a safe number (and it still breaks sometimes)

STRING2: : Deck of Cards clicked with a restriction added
: Forced S1 to draw a card
: Forced S2 to draw a card
: Forced S3 to draw a card
: Not enough cards in the deck.. attempting to reshuffle deck..
: Attempting to reshuffle the deck from the discard pile

STRING1: : S1 forgot tres and drew a card -
: S2 forgot tres and drew a card -
: S3 forgot tres and drew a card -

COMMENT: Before, it would break if it tried to reshuffle a Wild Card,
This is because a Wild Card must be Wild and not colored.
This script basically just makes colored wild cards, into normal wilds
Check if there are any colored wild cards in the deck, if not, then continue as normal
A non-wild, wild card has been found
It will now check what card it found, then replace it with the wild version
Need to keep at least 1 card in the discard, or else bad things start happening..
moves a card over from the discard pile to the deck. Repeat until all but one is moved
No cards left in the deck, need to transfer from the discard pile.
Instead of seeing a list of the cards in the Deck, it shows you a number instead.
Just a little fun, changes the look of the deck if the mouse is over it
the script to draw cards
This is the draw 3 and draw 6 script
If there is not enough cards, it will wait for the deck to reshuffle
If there are still 0 cards after, after a bit it will give up, when? dont ask me.
redraws the cards on screen
No cards left in the deck, make a sound, and thats about it
The draw1/2/3 should only activate when someone forgets tres
Very simple, just displays who's turn it is
Test the functionality of the Tres button. Make S1 only have 4 cards
Shows the Tres button whenever a player has only 4 cards, and its their turn
If a player forgets to call tres, the game makes them draw cards
To make sure the player doesnt accidently press on the button
Draw the color picker on screen
The manual way of labeling clones, before i found Clones+
Adds a background once the colors are shown
Shows the glow around the deck, if a Draw card has been played

z|.text:
You can add 3 cards to equal the number of the card in the discard pile

You cannot add cards that have the same color in the discard pile, or if you can play a card

COMMENT: draws each of the i circles
These are all the tips.
All of this code just makes sure that it shows the proper information
All of this fun code is to make it so that the amount of cards each player has is shown at the top
It turns red once a players has under 4 cards, and turns blue when it is their turn
Background on the cards, make the cards pop more
First card on the discard pile
